effect.ruby_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Hits three times in the same turn. The second hit has double power, and the third hit has triple power. Each hit has a separate accuracy check, and this move stops if a hit misses. skill link does not apply.
effect.emerald: Inflicts regular damage. Hits three times in the same turn. The second hit has double power, and the third hit has triple power. Each hit has a separate accuracy check, and this move stops if a hit misses. skill link does not apply.

effect.xd: Inflicts regular damage. Hits three times in the same turn. The second hit has double power, and the third hit has triple power. Each hit has a separate accuracy check, and this move stops if a hit misses. skill link does not apply.

short_effect.ruby_sapphire: Hits three times, increasing power by 100% with each successful hit.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Kicks the foe 3 times in a row with rising intensity.
flavor_text.emerald: Kicks the foe 3 times in a row with rising intensity.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A 3-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successive hit.
